verses.verse: From <S%G4159>whence<s%> come <S%G4171>wars<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3163>fightings<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you?<s%> come they <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1782>hence,<s%> even <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2237>lusts<s%> that <S%G4754>war<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3196>members?<s%>

Ye <S%G1937>lust,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>not:<s%> ye <S%G5407>kill,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> desire to <S%G2206>have,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2013>obtain:<s%> ye <S%G3164>fight<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4170>war,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> ye <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>not,<s%> because <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G3361>not.<s%>

Ye <S%G3432>adulterers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3428>adulteresses,<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> ye <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5373>friendship<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2189>enmity<s%> with <S%G2316>God?<s%> <S%G3739>whosoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1014>will<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> a <S%G5384>friend<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2525>is<s%> the <S%G2190>enemy<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G1325>giveth<s%> <S%G3187>more<s%> <S%G5485>grace.<s%> <S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> he <S%G3004>saith,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G498>resisteth<s%> the <S%G5244>proud,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1325>giveth<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> unto the <S%G5011>humble.<s%>

Draw <S%G1448>nigh<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he will draw <S%G1448>nigh<s%> to <S%G5213>you.<s%> <S%G2511>Cleanse<s%> your <S%G5495>hands,<s%> ye <S%G268>sinners;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G48>purify<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> ye double <S%G1374>minded.<s%>
Humble <S%G5013>yourselves<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he shall lift you <S%G5312>up.<s%> <S%G5209><s%>

Speak not <S%G2635>evil<s%> <S%G3361><s%> one of <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G80>brethren.<s%> He that speaketh <S%G2635>evil<s%> of his <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2919>judgeth<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> speaketh <S%G2635>evil<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2919>judgeth<s%> the <S%G3551>law:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> thou <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G4163>doer<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> a <S%G2923>judge.<s%>

Go <S%G33>to<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> ye that <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G4594>Today<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G839>tomorrow<s%> we will <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3592>such<s%> a <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>continue<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G1520>a<s%> <S%G1763>year,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> buy and <S%G1710>sell,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> get gain: <S%G2770><s%>

Whereas <S%G3748><s%> ye <S%G1987>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> shall be on <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G839>morrow.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> is <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2222>life?<s%> It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1063>even<s%> a <S%G822>vapor,<s%> that <S%G5316>appeareth<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> a little <S%G3641>time,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1899>then<s%> vanisheth <S%G853>away.<s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> to him that <S%G1492>knoweth<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2570>good,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>doeth<s%> it <S%G3361>not,<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>
